sentence: Oz” spinoff, hosted by Mehmet Oz’s daughter Daphne Oz, debuted to a 0.4 rating.
author: Tony Maglio
title: ‘Dr. Oz’ Spinoff’s Debut Ratings Down One Third From Final Week of ‘Dr. Oz’

sentence: +4 View gallery The celebrity heart surgeon, who recently ended his daytime TV show to run for office, was captured bending down and kissing the pink and gold star on the famous Los Angeles boulevard +4 View gallery The anti-Hollywood attack ad is being run by a group who supports hedge fund CEO David McCormick (pictured), who has former White House communications director Hope Hicks working for him +4 View gallery Dr. Mehmet Oz stands over his new star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at a ceremony on Friday That same career, however, is being used against him by rivals who are picking apart his TV shows and his past as a self-styled wellness and anti-obesity advocate to fuel doubt about his conservative credentials as a Republican.
author: Associated Press
title: Dr Oz's rival in the Pennsylvania Senate race claims he is too 'Hollywood' as he's given a STAR on the Walk of Fame (and bent down to kiss it)
‘The Good Dish’ Not Returning For Season 2 In Syndication; Sony Pictures TV Exploring Options

sentence: Reality has apparently caught up with Dr. Mehmet Oz.
author: David Reddish
title: Dr. Oz’s disastrous Senate campaign reportedly on “life support” as he eyes TV comeback

sentence: pic.twitter.com/fJaVLKVWOC — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) March 24, 2022 The TV host then denounced Biden for being “petty” and “political” in his action, and assured he had “no intention” of resigning.
author: Cynthia Cook
title: Dr. Oz Claps Back After Joe Biden Fires Him From President’s Sports Council: Watch

sentence: On Wednesday, the White House sent letters to Dr Mehmet Oz and former football star Herschel Walker – two Republican Senate candidates in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively – asking them to submit their resignations or face termination.
author: Maya Yang
title: White House tells Dr Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from fitness council

sentence: I am proud of my service and will not resign.pic.twitter.com/EP1vHWATp4 — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@Dr. Mehmet Oz) 1648071503 A recent Fox News poll shows Oz trailing David McCormick in the Republican primary, 24-15 percent, after having enjoyed a lead in the race shortly after announcing his candidacy.
author: Timothy Evans
title: Dr. Oz faces backlash from 'furious' longtime staffers after laying them off without warning

sentence: | Riccardo Savi/Getty Images for Concordia Summit By Holly Otterbein and Natalie Allison 04/09/2022 06:44 PM EDT Updated: 04/09/2022 08:10 PM EDT Dr. Mehmet Oz has won the race for Donald Trump’s coveted endorsement in Pennsylvania’s Senate GOP primary.
title: Trump endorses Oz in key Senate race

sentence: Over the weekend, former President Donald Trump endorsed Mehmet Oz — "Dr. Oz" to the many viewers of his longtime syndicated television show — in the Pennsylvania GOP primary for U.S. Senate.
author: Joel Mathis
title: Trump's real ideology: fame

sentence: As the most reliable and balanced news aggregation service on the internet, DML News App offers the following information published by TheHill.com: Frustration is mounting on the GOP’s right flank over former President Trump’s endorsement of Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania Senate race.
author: DML News App
title: POLL: After you see THIS, do you support Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate?

sentence: pic.twitter.com/XkIE6qV4R0 — Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz) March 16, 2022 We live in a time where too many Republicans try selling their conservative wares just to get elected only to start functioning like barely-disguised left-of-center RINOs once they get into office.
author: Rusty Weiss
title: I’m Just Going To Say This: Trump’s Endorsement Of Dr. Oz Is The Wrong Move
